nodes.text: Jason Palmer is an artist who illustrated the cover of No Disintegrations. He appeared at the Art Shows at Celebration IV and Celebration Europe. He also worked on The Essential Guide to Warfare.

Palmer has illustrated for several other properties, including Battlestar Galactica, Indiana Jones, Star Trek, Harry Potter, and Firefly/Serenity. Regarding a piece Palmer did featuring the crew of Serenity, Joss Whedon claimed it was the greatest compliment he'd received to his show.
